entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Fort Erie
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 16 except 11 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 16 except 11 near Lake Erie. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 02 May 2016
